
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
mastercard <- read_excel("mastercard_data.xlsx")
```

```{r}
#what does the donation index mean
colnames(mastercard)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = mastercard, aes(x=Month, y=Donation)) + geom_point()
```
